item.title: VSCO made a new way to shoot photos on your iPhone
item.description: VSCO has widely released its camera app for the iPhone. The app, called Capture, lets you switch between VSCO’s filters and make adjustments before snapping a photo or recording a video. VSCO has beco

item.title: Dictionary.com “devastated” paid users by abruptly deleting saved words lists
item.description: Dictionary website isn’t offering refunds and is now only available with ads.

item.title: 4 Best Music Streaming Services (2024): Spotify, Apple Music, and More Compared
item.description: Plunge into the stream with the best apps to discover music, share it among friends, and rock out.

item.title: Now Jack Dorsey has built an app to track your vitamin D
item.description: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey has released a new app that tracks your sun exposure and vitamin D levels. It’s his second app in a week, after last weekend’s encrypted peer-to-peer messaging app Bitch
